title: Bellova Ves
text:
Bellova Ves (, ) is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> in the <a href="Dunajsk%C3%A1%20Streda%20District">Dunajská Streda District</a> in the <a href="Trnava%20Region">Trnava Region</a> of south-west <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>.
Census 2011: 229 inhabitants
122 Slovaks, 56 Hungarians and 51 others nationality
Geography.
The <a href="municipality">municipality</a> lies at an <a href="altitude">altitude</a> of 119 metres and covers an <a href="area">area</a> of 6.929 km². The village has food shop and a public library.
